snippet.title: THE BLACK MASSES - Official Gameplay Trailer (New Open World Zombie Game 2019)
snippet.description:
THE BLACK MASSES - Official Reveal Trailer (New Open World RPG Game 2019) 

The Black Masses is a highly ambitious first person open world RPG developed by a small team @Brilliant Game Studios. It features the record breaking crowd rendering technology from our previous title, Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator. TBM is set in a massive medieval fantasy setting on a 16 sq-km island. Fight off tens of thousands of demon possessed souls while trying to solve the mysteries of what started the satanic uprising. 

Game Support :https://www.facebook.com/theblackmassesofficial

• Release Date: Coming 2019
• Platform: To be announced

►SUBSCRIBE: http://goo.gl/w0ca4q
